attributes.action: Make it company policy that restaurant and bars' staff training includes awareness of Diabetic's (Type 1 and 2) drink needs.
attributes.additional_details: Many type 1 and 2 diabetics dine at restaurants and visit bars yet don't have any confidence that when they ask for a specific drink suitable for them, they are actually given this drink. This should change as diabetics should be able to dine in the confidence that they were given the drink that they asked for. The government should make it a policy that all restaurants and bars have a training policy that includes awareness diabetics' drink needs.
